message.content:
To solve this task, we need to identify the line item in the income statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This line item is typically labeled as "Depreciation" in the income statement.

Looking at the provided income statement, we can see the following line item:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Depreciation | 91488.35 | 2024-02-05 |

The value associated with "Depreciation" is "91488.35". This is the amount that represents the accumulated systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life for the given period.

Therefore, the solution is:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91488.35'}}
```
